goals.1: Storing all objects in the container.
goals.2: If there is a elastic object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: don't pick and place a box called bin
rules.2: when place a rigid objects in the bin, the soft objects must be in the bin before
rules.3: before place a elastic object, push a elastic object first
rules.4: do not place a fragile object if there is no elastic object in the bin
